content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava. What’s your name, please?
Thanks, Hannah! Can you please share your address so I can check our availability and make sure you’re in our service area?
Oh, uh, sure. 129 Grove St, Unit 3B.
Thanks for the address! What type of service do you need help with: plumbing, electrical, or heating/AC?
It’s something electrical… like, half my outlets don’t work suddenly.
Got it, electrical issue with several outlets not working. I can help schedule a visit for you. What day and time works best for our electrician to come by?
Honestly I’m just too busy this month to schedule anything. Maybe I’ll try again later if I can. Thanks though.
reason: Customer too busy this month to book an appointment.
